message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good chunk of money.
I understand you want a 'good chunk', but so do I.  This offer is much fairer.
Bob, let's not waste time. My offer is still generous considering the inflation. This is a good deal for both of us.

Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair offer at this point.  Take it before inflation makes this whole thing a waste of time.
